buyback.initTitle: Declare your first device to trade!
buyback.waitingDescription: Patience... depending on your plan, you can trade every {delay} months.

form.choiceBrand: What is the brand of your {device}?
form.choiceModel: What is the model of your device?

findImei.title: What is the IMEI code and where to find it?
findImei.content:
The IMEI code uniquely identifies your mobile phone.
Composed of 15 to 17 digits, this code can be found on the purchase invoice of your device or on the original packaging box.

There are other ways to find your IMEI code:
Dial *#06# on your phone, and your IMEI number will be displayed on the screen;

Visit the settings of your smartphone if you have an iPhone or a Samsung.

It can also be found under the battery of Android models.

confirm.title: Registration confirmed!
confirm.subtitle: You will soon be able to trade your device.
confirm.content: Check the homepage to know when to request your new device. In the meantime, you can add another device right now.

modalDevice.title: Your {device}
modalDevice.warning: Attention! The device you want to trade must be in working condition.

modalConfirmation.title: It's in the bag!
modalConfirmation.subtitle: Congratulations! Your request has been successfully recorded.
modalConfirmation.content: A teleadvisor will call you very soon. They will explain how to send your device and proceed with the trade to get your new device.

account.title: My Information

assistance.title: Call Support
assistance.content: Support is available from Monday to Friday from 9 am to 7 pm and on Saturday from 9 am to 6:30 pm

account.warning: To request the modification or deletion of your personal data, contact us via email at solution@hubside.com or call our teleadvisors.
